member.name: T:EnrollmentClassLibrary.BaseTransaction
member.summary: The BaseTransaction is an abstract class containing the common properties and methods of all CMS Transactions.

member.name: T:EnrollmentClassLibrary.ITransaction
member.summary: The ITransaction iterface assures that all transaction classes implement common methods.

member.name: M:EnrollmentClassLibrary.ITransaction.Validate
member.summary: The validate method performas a global validation of all the properties of the transaction.
member.returns: A value of true indicates that all the data on this transaction is valid and ready to send to CMS. A value of false indicates that data errors exist.

member.name: M:EnrollmentClassLibrary.ITransaction.Insert
member.summary: Stub for the insert method

member.name: M:EnrollmentClassLibrary.BaseTransaction.Validate
member.summary: The validate method is part of the ITransaction interface. This method checks the values of the transaction and returns true if the elements pass the edit checks; otherwise it returns false.
member.returns: A value of true indicates that all the data on this transaction is valid and ready to send to CMS. A value of false indicates that data errors exist.

member.name: M:EnrollmentClassLibrary.BaseTransaction.Insert
member.summary: Stub for the Insert method
